extendedInfo.description: This application simulates battle die rolls for risk like board games.  Instead of having to roll out large army invasions that take up a decent amount of time you can simply enter how many armies a player is attacking with and how many are able to defend.  Click calculate and viola in no time at all the results is displayed for you. It show who won the battle and how many armies they have remaining.Also, it shows a roll by roll account of the entire battle.
